original_text:
Ancient Egypt
Ancient Egypt della Pragmatic Play si inserisce nel fortunato filone di slot machine che hanno come tema l’antica cultura egiziana. Questa tematica è forse quella più sviluppata in assoluto nell’ambito dei giochi di slot e praticamente tutte le principali software house ne propongono una o più di una nel loro catalogo.
Il tema egiziano pare non stancare mai i giocatori, tanto che alcuni sviluppatori offrono delle intere serie che si giocano all’ombra delle piramidi: è il caso della Novomatic con la sua Book of Ra, fortunatissima saga che include anche una slot con sei rulli anziché i canonici 5 e svariate versioni adatte proprio a tutti i gusti!
Inoltre, le slot machine ambientate sulle rive del Nilo offrono ai produttori la possibilità di sbizzarrirsi con grafiche molto belle, come ci dimostra anche la stessa Ancient Egypt.
Caratteristiche principali
Ancient Egypt si presenta come una tradizionale slot machine a cinque rulli e 10 linee di pagamento, con un range di scommesse cha va da soli dieci centesimi fino a 50 €: è dunque un gioco abbastanza “soft” per quanto riguarda le puntate, tuttavia la vincita massima equivalente a 5000 volte l’importo scommesso la rende comunque degna di attenzione.
La volatilità di questa slot è medio-alta, per cui non sarà frequentissimo ottenere delle vincite ma queste potranno essere anche consistenti.
Con un RTP del 96,13% infine, Ancient Egypt si colloca nella media delle altre slot machine della Pragmatic Play come ritorno al giocatore.
I simboli di Ancient Egypt
La regina Cleopatra in persona apre il gioco e rappresenta anche uno tra i più importanti simboli tematici di questa slot, pagando ben 250 € quando compare sui rulli per cinque volte. Tra gli altri simboli a tema egiziano troviamo l’occhio di Ra, la divinità Anobi e la croce egizia, ciascuno con un valore diverso.
Accanto a questi simboli ci sono quelli tradizionali e non tematici, le carte da gioco dal 10 all’Asso, che, tra tutti, sono i simboli che hanno valore minore.
In questa slot machine Wild e Scatter sono rappresentati dalla stessa icona, lo Scarabeo D’Oro: se durante un singolo giro compare sui rulli per 3, 4 o 5 volte, a prescindere dalla posizione occupata, paga una vincita pari a 1, 10 o ben 50 volte la puntata.
Lo Scarabeo d’oro permette inoltre di accedere all’unica funzionalità speciale del gioco: sulla schermata appariranno tre caselle e in base a quella scelta si vincerà un premio diverso.
Il premio più basso è rappresentato da una vincita pari alla puntata, quello più alto fino a 500 volte, inoltre si potranno guadagnare anche dei giri gratuiti, all’interno dei quali un simbolo scelto a caso diventerà Wild espandibile, che vi potrà regalare il montepremi di 5000 volte la puntata se la regina Cleopatra coprirà tutta la schermata.

Ancient Egypt by Pragmatic Play is one of the many slot machines that pays homage to the ancient Egyptian culture. The slot is medium to high volatility, and players can expect reasonably frequent, substantial wins. With an RTP of 96.13%, Ancient Egypt falls within Pragmatic Play's average return to player rate.

The Gold Scarab also unlocks the game's one bonus feature, where you choose a box to win a variety of different prizes. Players can earn up to 500 times their bet or earn free spins, with a randomly selected symbol selected for expanding wilds. This could potentially lead to the game's grand prize of 5000 times the initial bet if all symbols on the screen transform into Cleopatra. 

The allure of Ancient Egypt never fades, and with Pragmatic Play's Ancient Egypt, players can immerse themselves in the mystery and excitement of that ancient culture.

Ancient Egypt as a prevalent theme in slot games

The theme of ancient Egypt is one of the most developed in the world of slot games, with practically all major software companies offering one or more variations in their catalog. This theme never seems to tire players and offers manufacturers the opportunity to indulge in beautiful graphics, as is the case with Pragmatic Play's 'Ancient Egypt'.

Game mechanics and specifications

'Ancient Egypt' is a five-reel slot machine with 10 paylines and a betting range of 10 cents to 50 €, making it approachable for players of all levels. The maximum win of 5000 times the amount wagered makes it a game that is worth checking out. The volatility of this slot is medium-high, with an RTP of 96.13%.

Symbol values and significance

The thematic symbols in 'Ancient Egypt' include Queen Cleopatra, paying €250 when appearing five times, the Eye of Ra, the deity Anobi, and the Egyptian cross, each with different values. The traditional playing cards from ten to ace are also present, with the lowest value. The Golden Scarab acts as both Wild and Scatter and pays a win equal to 1, 10, or 50 times the bet when appearing three, four, or five times.

Special features and potential payouts

The Golden Scarab allows players to access the game's only special feature, where choosing one of three boxes on the screen can lead to winning a prize, ranging from the bet to up to 500 times the bet. The game also offers free spins, and a randomly chosen symbol will become an expandable Wild during these spins, which can lead to the jackpot of 5000 times the bet if Queen Cleopatra covers the entire screen.

Overall design and gaming experience

'Ancient Egypt' is an enjoyable slot machine experience with solid potential payouts and an exciting Egyptian theme. The graphics are well-crafted, and the game mechanics are approachable for players of all levels. It is a game worth checking out for anyone who enjoys exploring the world of slot machines.

"Ancient Egypt" by Pragmatic Play is a lucky addition to the slot machine genre with its theme of ancient Egyptian culture. This theme is perhaps the most developed in the world of slot games, and practically all major software companies offer one or more in their catalog.

The Egyptian theme never seems to tire players, so much so that some developers offer entire series that are played in the shadow of the pyramids. This is the case with Novomatic and their highly successful Book of Ra series, which includes a six-reel slot instead of the standard five and various versions suitable for all tastes!

Furthermore, slot machines set on the banks of the Nile offer manufacturers the opportunity to indulge in beautiful graphics, as "Ancient Egypt" shows us.

Key Features:

"Ancient Egypt" presents itself as a traditional five-reel slot machine with 10 paylines, with a betting range ranging from just ten cents to 50 €, making it quite "soft" in terms of bets. However, the maximum win of 5000 times the amount wagered makes it worthy of attention.

The volatility of this slot is medium-high, so it may not be very frequent to get wins, but they can be significant. With an RTP of 96.13%, "Ancient Egypt" is in line with the average of other Pragmatic Play slot machines in terms of the player's return.

The Symbols of "Ancient Egypt":

Queen Cleopatra herself opens the game and is also one of the most important thematic symbols of this slot, paying a whopping €250 when she appears on the reels five times. Among the other Egyptian-themed symbols, we find the Eye of Ra, the deity Anobi, and the Egyptian cross, each with a different value.

In addition to these symbols, there are the traditional and non-thematic playing cards from ten to ace, which are the symbols with the lowest value.

In this slot machine, Wild and Scatter are represented by the same icon, the Golden Scarab: if it appears on the reels three, four, or five times during a single spin, regardless of its position, it pays a win equal to 1, 10, or even 50 times the bet.

The Golden Scarab also allows you to access the game's only special feature: three boxes will appear on the screen, and depending on the one chosen, you will win a different prize.

The lowest prize is a win equal to the bet, and the highest is up to 500 times. You can also earn free spins, during which a randomly chosen symbol will become an expandable Wild, which can give you the jackpot of 5000 times the bet if Queen Cleopatra covers the entire screen.

As an experienced gambler, "Ancient Egypt" offers a solid and enjoyable slot machine experience with the potential for significant payouts and an exciting Egyptian theme.
